snippet: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said Friday that there was “a body of evidence that points to the increased likelihood of a terrorist attack in Australia.”
abstract: Australian Prime Min Tony Abbott raises terrorism alert from medium to high after warnings from security officials that growing number of Australians joining extremist groups represents increased threat to country.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said Friday that there was “a body of evidence that points to the increased likelihood of a terrorist attack in Australia.”

headline.main: Australia Raises Terrorism Alert Level to High
headline.print_headline: Terrorism Alert Level Raised to High
